snippet.title: Intellivision - Armor Battle © 1979 Mattel - Gameplay
snippet.description:
DESCRIPTION
Dust off your field glasses and scan the horizon for enemy tanks. There's one -- grinding its way out of the woods! Who will fire a split second sooner? And who will be reduced to a pile of rubble? When you've beaten your opponent, move on to a new battlefield. There are literally hundreds of new terrains to conquer! War may be nerve-wracking, but this is pure fun!
